website_summaries.verdict: The Salomon Sense Pulse is a neutral running shoe that offers generous cushioning. It is ideal for heel strikers and performs well on both road and off-road runs.
pros: Some heel strikers took note of the generous cushioning of the Sense Pulse
Open mesh upper features breathability and quick drying trait
Most runners applauded the easy one pull lacing system of the Salomon Sense Pulse
This shoe offers impressive traction while running on varied terrains as mentioned in some reviews
This shoe features Sensifit overlays for a closer and secure fit
Some runners took note of the improved ground feel and comfort that the Salomon SensePulse offers
cons: The Sense Pulse is a moderately high-priced shoe
Some runners noticed that this shoe is a bit heavy
As noted on some reviews, the anti-debris protection needs improvement

customer_reviews.title: I can't say l enjoy the feeling of them
customer_reviews.text: I bought them for hiking, but I mostly run in them. Stiff, protective against rocks. Wear them both on road and trails. I can't say l enjoy the feeling of them, but they are comfortable. Despite high sole, I never felt that I was going to twist my ankle even on rocks.
customer_reviews.author: Gogi G

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: I really like this shoes. The only negative I could say is that it's somewhat small. By looking at it, it seems big but it's a little tight. I'm usually between size 9-10 and I ordered size 10. Next time I would order 10.5-11. Other than that, I'm happy with the shoes. Way better than other shoes that I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: jerry r.

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit...
customer_reviews.text: Great price, great fit, great color, comfortable sneakers. I'm a big fan of Salomon sneakers and own quite a few pairs. I put many miles on each pair and they look as good as the day I bought them. The shell/ body of the sneaker are well made, but the downfall is that for the miles I power walk that I do, the sole of the sneakers wear down after 8/9 months. When it's time to trash the sneaker, they still look good as when you bought them. I'm still looking for sneakers that have tough soles that can handle MANY miles, recommendations would be appreciated. As to wear for normal walk and activity, these are great and look good.
customer_reviews.author: Mr, Robbie Ace

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a good running shoe for wide feet
customer_reviews.text: Great price for a good running shoe for wide feet! I needed a indoor/treadmill gym shoe and im obsessed with Salomon trail shoes so i thought I would give these a whirl. They are comfortable and fit true to size and my feet felt great after running sprints in them for over an hour!
customer_reviews.author: Terra L

customer_reviews.title: ... so far and find them to be the most comfortable sports shoe I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Have bought 3 pairs of Salomons so far and find them to be the most comfortable sports shoe I have ever owned. No break in period, just put on and go. I have Nikes and Adidas as well as several other brands but Salomons are now my go to brand. As well as comfort they have great style and tread. I continue to check for new styles and colors. You should too. Mac
customer_reviews.author: mac mcdermott

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Second pair of Sense Pulse's I have bought, and I absolutely love these shoes. If you are a trail runner, you will appreciate the excellent padding and light weight of the shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Lillie

customer_reviews.title: Heel striker heaven
customer_reviews.text: So far very happy with the show. I'm a heel striker and run 30 to 40 miles a week. Only have 16 miles on these but no heel pain day of or next day. A little on the heavy side but perfect for training till race day.
customer_reviews.author: Tate Velau

customer_reviews.title: Great trail running shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great trail running shoe, I like the Sense Fit Sock, fit and cushioning. Its not a technical running shoe, but great for running on improved/maintained trails.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Q

customer_reviews.title: I received my package and was very pleased I was very skeptical by ordering shoes online thinking ...
customer_reviews.text: I received my package and was very pleased I was very skeptical by ordering shoes online thinking it might not fit in might not look good. Fortunately it fit very well I was very pleased and I would order it again.
customer_reviews.author: Bernard  Del Castillo

customer_reviews.title: Solid shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Solid shoes that hold up to extend abuse. I destroy shoes as an athlete. These not only hold up but they also don't stink. Lol! I like everything from the unique lacing system to the overall construction. Great shoes for vegans as well.
customer_reviews.author: Gary J. Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Fits me
customer_reviews.text: Don’t have a lot of miles on these yet, but they are comfortable and lightweight. Just what I want when I’m running
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Parker

customer_reviews.title: Fun style. Supportive fit.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes on sale b/c I wanted to try Salomon for urban Fitbit walks and light trail hiking. I usually wear NB, Asics, Merril and Nike. Salomon provided a lot of support on the sides of the shoes which are great on uneven surfaces so you don't turn your ankle.
customer_reviews.author: Hobby-Sutton

customer_reviews.title: Both CrossFit and Running
customer_reviews.text: CrossFit and running approved! I've worn them for both now and they are comfortable and don't slip around on me. Also tons of compliments on the color!
customer_reviews.author: Bzz Van

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: All Salomon's don't fit the same. If buying shoes online check the return policy. Great shoe but a small toe box.
customer_reviews.author: JamesPeters

customer_reviews.title: Great cushion. Not as nimble as my XR Missions ...
customer_reviews.text: Great cushion. Not as nimble as my XR Missions so I'll probably go back to them once these wear out but I do like these for putting along on the trails.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first pair of Salomon shoes. I am very impressed!!
customer_reviews.author: Randal Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The product came in exactly the same size as I had expected.
customer_reviews.author: Oguz09

customer_reviews.title: Too heavy
customer_reviews.text: Shoe is good but I feel its too heavy. Can't run. I even sprained my leg once .
customer_reviews.author: MMenon

customer_reviews.title: Love the trail shoes
customer_reviews.text: First time with a Salomon Road Shoe. Love the trail shoes, must say... I now love the road shoe as well. 50+ miles a week, shoe feels great!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Binette

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The one running shoe this supinator can run in since I crushed a metatarsal 8 years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Jim and Cathy Monkman

customer_reviews.title: Happy Runner
customer_reviews.text: Exceptional, hubby finds he can run longer and faster with these.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer P

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: they seem pretty great. fit well. the new glove kinda fit.
customer_reviews.author: Babybearblueeyes

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe if you are into bulky shoes
customer_reviews.text: Good shoe if you are into bulky shoes. I love my previous 5 or so pairs of Salomons which is why I purchased these but they are somewhat big all around. Not for me!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just buy the shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Nice thick bottom for long distance running, incredible tread, and as always expected from salomon is the comfort, which is definitely delivered.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but my feet have felt better with these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I've been struggling with sore arches and plantar issues. Wanted to try something with a firmer sole. Have only ran twice so far, but my feet have felt better with these shoes. These shoes feel like they have a high point near the mid foot, which really encourages a proper mid-foot strike. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: chadplusplus

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic shoe for an awesome price
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, sturdy sole, perfect for running on the sidewalk. Love these shoes. I usually wear a 10.5 in Nike (which are smallish) so 10.5 was the perfect fit. I also bought some more expensive Salomon trail shoes but I actually prefer these for a run on anything but the wildest terrain.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Walls

customer_reviews.title: It is a bit boxy and doesn't feel all that comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is too small plus it feels cheaply made. It is a bit boxy and doesn't feel all that comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: AEC

customer_reviews.title: cushing is good.
customer_reviews.text: the lace is regular. not salomon special lace. will return it. cushing is good.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Fu Lee

product_meta.title: SALOMON, Men, Sneaker, Sense Pulse
product_meta.description: A highly cushioned ride and noticeable forward propulsion for the harder striking runner. Contagrip provides unique traction technology. With a mix of compound, lob geometry and density, it gives the shoe brilliant grip and durability, regardless of the terrain underneath. The OS tendon provides a dynamic ride chassis, with brilliant cushioning, multi-directional grip and natural motion. The combination of propriception (feel) and protection is brilliantly provided. Endofit is an internal fit sleeve designed to hug the foot in exactly the right places and improve feedback and footwrapping.
feature_bullets: Cushioned and supportive runner with low drop and bright mesh-lined collar
